Reviews.Title: Not recommended, very disappointed
Reviews.Author: popgam357
Reviews.Content: NOT Recommend: I have had three 19821w cameras for 13 months now. Throughout the year the cameras would be intermittent in staying connected (wireless). When they were connected was a very good picture and could view them away from home with IP cam viewer. When contacting support it was a headache, they didn't listen and seemed to have a set script to use (their way) I wanted to use internet explorer; they keep trying to use chrome or a different browser.  It would always take a couple of hours to get anything done and when it was over was normally ready to throw the cameras away. Now do to the last update one of the camera’s quit streaming video, it also screwed up the IP tool on my desk top (had to restore my computer to an earlier version to make it work right again). Tech support could not get the IP tool or the camera working again. Told me to take the computer to an IT specialists to make it work again and to get an RMA to replace the camera. Well heard back from returns today the camera is a month out of warranty and they won't replace it, even though it was their update that broke it. Will NOT recommend these camera's to anyone.

Reviews.Title: It works but don't expect good software design
Reviews.Author: R. Lee
Reviews.Content: I wanted to install a camera for security surveillance for a long while.  After reviewing all the models available, I decided on buying this camera.  I got it from Amazon for below $100, so it was an OK deal at time of purchase.  If you are not technically inclined, this will give you some trouble.  Its Windows application is not user friendly although not difficult to use once you got used to hitting extra few buttons.  You need to search for the camera, then add it and define an area before seeing the video.  I set it up to detect motion and I have to say it is really good.  I tried it for a few days and it sent pictures to my work email so I know when the kids get home or there is unexpected intruder.  All works well so far.  I also tried using their free DDNS account to set up remote access.  Each camera comes with a free account for that purpose but the instructions said nothing about it.  What I discovered is that the web accounts are different from the user accounts set up via the Windows application.  And the default admin account on the web server has no password.  It took me a couple of hours to figure out these differences; but once it is up, my family can download the free smartphone app and see the video stream on their phone.  But for security reason I disabled it afterwards since this requires you to set up your router for port forwarding, this open up a hole for people to hack into your home network.  I plan to use it only when away for vacation.  Pan and tilt control can be difficult but you can use preset position to overcome this issue.  The video looks good and I have no complaint.  Infra-red works but I have no big use of it as this camera is not mounted outdoor.  I did not try the audio yet but don't expect it to be great for a wireless model.  The most irritating thing I found was each time when you logged into the windows application, the application left a directory CMS on your C: drive.  This Windows application also left a Record directory on your C drive.  And you have to manually delete multiple CMS directories so your C drive won't look like crap after a while.  This looks like some sort of time-stamp files and so far I cannot find a way to relocate them on the Windows application.  After completing initial set-up with Windows application, you can switch to use web access as your primary means to check the camera via wireless network, and this stamped file won't happen anymore.  One thing the web account can do and Windows application can't is to set the system time correct for daylight saving.  This part is missing on the Windows side.I did call their customer support two times for questions.  The first offshore guy speaks good English so after a few-minute discussion, I resolved my issue of knowing to hit some extra buttons to get the video.  The second guy however has typical difficult-to-understand foreign accent, it took some effort to communicate with him.  There is no deal breaker so far BUT don't expect user-friendly software to help you through this process.  Instructions that come with the hardware are minimal and it is worse than a summary in most cases. I did find a Youtube video by Foscam to set up an older model, it helps but not in a direct way.If you are good at searching answers on internet, know your router and understand web access, there should be no big challenge to set this up.  If not, this is far from plug and play so you may have to find a friend who does this before.

Reviews.Title: Foscam Service
Reviews.Author: Danny Cano
Reviews.Content: Great Service by Calvin, He took his time to help me setup my camera and got me running in minutes.the camera is great I got 6

Reviews.Title: So Far.. Four stars
Reviews.Author: Benjamin P Cable
Reviews.Content: I am not completely set up but Mason of Foscam has my camera operational. I gave up on the instructions and decided to call US Support. I am also impressed that I was not on hold or on phone for hours, it was 40 min tops. Thank you.

Reviews.Title: Excellent customer service and product support
Reviews.Author: Chris Jordan
Reviews.Content: I had trouble setting up remote viewing and my service tech Calvin was excellent in helping with it.  The camera is excellent and a great piece to our security system.

Reviews.Title: Good Customer Service
Reviews.Author: F. Monsky "Jazz fella"
Reviews.Content: When I had issues with wireless connectivity and settings, the Foscam rep "Marshall" helped set things straight quickly. Using the Teamviewer program, he was able to fix things nicely. Thanks.

Reviews.Title: F19821w cam
Reviews.Author: Janet Hossaini
Reviews.Content: Irish at tech support helped me set up the camera with wireless and remote app for Android.  He knew what he was doing without me having to ask him to set things up.  I highly recommend this camera, it is well-built and the software is nicely executed.  AAAA++++++++++ Rating  Thank you

Reviews.Title: Very Satisfied with the Foscam Camera and Tech Support
Reviews.Author: Harold
Reviews.Content: I like the camera very much.  The features are excellent for the price.  Lidiya at Foscam Tech Support was extremely patient, competent, and helpful.

Reviews.Title: Foscam cam and support
Reviews.Author: Car Dude "Car Dude gone wild"
Reviews.Content: Very helpful got my problem resolvedIrish helped me in resolving the issues.love the remote access and iphone app access. I love that you can move the camera around 360 circle remotely.

Reviews.Title: Awesome customer service
Reviews.Author: Robert Reyes
Reviews.Content: A gentleman named "Mark" just helped me install the whole motion detection deal and was great. Very helpful in what he did. If there is anyway that his superiors could read this, I sure hope they keep him and promote him. I had lost my connection with him over the phone and he immediately opened up a browser in which we could chat and guided me through the process. Thank you Mark for putting the customer first.

Reviews.Title: Great camera's and awesome customer support
Reviews.Author: Ryan M Edmiston
Reviews.Content: Have several of these camera's around my house for monitoring and they are amazing. Their customer support is awesome as well. Irish, got me up and running within minutes and had everything working as advertised. I recommend these cameras to anyone looking to keep an eye on things while you are away.

Reviews.Title: Foscam Camera
Reviews.Author: Ron PIerce
Reviews.Content: Worked with Calvin on setting this camera up and he was a great help!  Works well and will buy others.

Reviews.Title: Hooked this up for my boss for his buisness
Reviews.Author: Fierce750
Reviews.Content: WOW what a picture!!!This thing is nice the picture quality is not grainy at ALL I had bought 2 FI9805 outdoor cams for my house and this thing destroys them.Has all the cool Power tilt controls too.I am now going to upgrade to these and buy the outdoor pods for them.Unbeatable for the price just get a decent program like Sighthound for the software the web browser is decent but it's nice to have Person detection and cloud recording as well.

Reviews.Title: Not bad... a little difficult to setup
Reviews.Author: steven
Reviews.Content: In general I like the camera.  I ran into a few issues during setup.  Primary issue was getting the DDNS working.  The regular instructions wanted to setup an HTTPS port which caused issues with the viewers I use.  I'm not sure what I did, but I finally got it to work with a regular old HTTP port.  Also, the Chrome plug-in needed an extra step that wasnt clearly explained in the instructions ... A little Googling help find the procedure to get the plug-in got installed OK.The picture quality is better than the regular webcam... but not as good as I hoped for 720P.  The web interface is pretty good.  I did try the SDCARD record feature and it worked fine..  The playback feature only worked in IE, it would not work in Chrome (although for a workaround, you could just download the file to you PC via the foscam interface and play them in media player).Overall, I'm satisfied

Reviews.Title: Foscam Support - Excellent!
Reviews.Author: Annemarie Schoemaker
Reviews.Content: The Foscam video monitoring cameras I purchased are fantastic.  And the support team was even better!I set it up with my iPad and it is extremely easy to use and convenient as a baby monitor for our family.

Reviews.Title: DDNS Setup
Reviews.Author: Mary-Ann Guzik
Reviews.Content: Calvin with Foscam helped me set up the camera over the phone while the computer was linked to Foscam.  This took all the guess work out of the process.

Reviews.Title: Foscam FI98212 V2
Reviews.Author: EDWARD KOZICKI
Reviews.Content: Tech Irish did an excellent job assisting me install my Foscam FI9821W V2 HD camera.  The pan and tilt features are working as advertised, which what I wanted in a camera.  EXCELLENT camera.

Reviews.Title: For the price, you get a lot.
Reviews.Author: CiscoEmployee
Reviews.Content: I have spent hours, like I am sure many of you have, looking and looking for the best PAN/TILT High-Def Wireless Camera. There seems to be NO MIDDLE CLASS product. Either you buy the cheap FOSCAM (Best of the cheap products) and you get a lot of feature and quality for less than $200. Or you jump to $1000 or more for commercial grade. I have had 4 of these now (2 older 9218 model) and all still work over two years. I use them for outdoor home security (I know, not suppose to, but they handle it just fine). Could they be better, YES....The video frame rate is not perfect, and the image quality can be a bit out of focus. But overall they do the job. I use the with a Synology NAS device and it all just works.Night Vision is outstanding. Image quality in 720P is really good (minus the focusing problem), Software offers a lot. The 9821W does have really good sound recording.I wish FOSCAM offered a way to adjust the lens focus in a more easy way.

Reviews.Title: Cool Device but tough to connect to
Reviews.Author: William Wrenn
Reviews.Content: This is definitely a nice web cam but the high resolution makes it hard to connect to remotely.  I have had to set the resolution  to 640 and frames per second to 4 and still have troubles.  I have only had this for a week and I am still working with Foscam and Mangocam trying new things. I own 2 FI8910W which work great.

Reviews.Title: great job
Reviews.Author: terell stewart
Reviews.Content: calvin was great with helping me get started with my new camera and he was very easy to deal with and he was smart

Reviews.Title: calvin is the best !!!
Reviews.Author: Amy Marcheschi
Reviews.Content: They work great with help of calvin !!!!!!!!!! They are great cams work any where ! now i can watch my my house any where !!Thank u foscam !!

Reviews.Title: Thomas
Reviews.Author: RJE
Reviews.Content: Very helpful in getting my cam network set up. Great job. Simplified this highly tecnical stuff. I recommend this service.

Reviews.Title: Technical support is superior!!
Reviews.Author: kris
Reviews.Content: Thomas  and David in tech support have helped me quickly setup my Foscam camera within 20 minutes of opening the packaging. I highly recommend this camera.It does have zoom, but the quality is great for my purposes. I was worried about ordering the camera because of the nightmares other reviewers have mention with port forwarding and camera setup, but it was super easy. I look forward to getting a few more for the rest of my house.

Reviews.Title: Thomas George helped me with my foscam setup
Reviews.Author: Jammy
Reviews.Content: Very professional and courteous technical support person. He was able to solve the problems I was having with my camera promptly. I'll definitely use him again for future problems.

Reviews.Title: Technical Support Help
Reviews.Author: Fernando Smith
Reviews.Content: The tech support "Thomas" that helped me with resolving my problem with my four camera was very helpful and patient, he is very knowledgeable, and know his way arrow the system.Thank you, Thomas the way to GOFernando Smith

Reviews.Title: Great Support from Foscam
Reviews.Author: dacer38
Reviews.Content: Irish was great support and completely configured my camera for local and remote use, thank you very muchfor your support.

Reviews.Title: great technical support..would recommend to any one...
Reviews.Author: Glenn Dunkel
Reviews.Content: a great and efficient tech...fixed in a few minutes...thanks will buy again....  Thomas thanks again!!  I believe I will save money on home security

Reviews.Title: Excellent customer service and camera
Reviews.Author: Ashkan K.
Reviews.Content: The camera itself works perfectly. The quality is amazing. I had issues because of my vonage line setting it up, but the customer service representative was able to fix this issue via remote access. This saved me a lot of time and struggle. I highly recommend!

Reviews.Title: great camera, great customer service
Reviews.Author: clint cooper
Reviews.Content: very pleased with the camera. had a very hard time getting it to connect wirelessly to my router and found help online but still had no luck. called customer service ans Jees was the agent i spoke with. he accessed my pc remotely and had everything working within minutes. great surveillance camera at a great price, cant wait to buy a few more and watch my house from my smartphone when i am away. i would recommend this product to anyone.

Reviews.Title: The camera work great
Reviews.Author: E. C. West
Reviews.Content: The support for the camera is great, and the recording is great the feature for the camera work really well. The camera work well for monitoring  baby crib and residence.

Reviews.Title: Great service - great product
Reviews.Author: Nancy
Reviews.Content: As a foscam "newbie"  I encountered a few set up problems - Thomas at Customer Service took care of them right away- now it is full steam ahead with the foscam.  Thank you Thomas -

Reviews.Title: Difficult but worth it!
Reviews.Author: Ronald G. Ramsey "Digital290"
Reviews.Content: I have one of the older cameras which worked fine and decided to add one.  These cameras are not easy to set up, but their telephone support is great.  They "took over" my computer remotely and got everything going without me doing much. I really like the higher resolution but the app to remotetly control the camera is a little slow because of the added burden on bandwidth. I tried Netgear cameras and took them back.

Reviews.Title: Awesome Service!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Johnboy
Reviews.Content: This is a great camera and was extremely easy to setup up thanks to Mason from customer service. He logged into my computer and did all the work in minutes..... Thanks a lot Mason

Reviews.Title: Nice Camera worth the money
Reviews.Author: karen
Reviews.Content: I had some problems with setting up the wireless portion with my wifi router but Paul Jackson from Foscam support was great with his help.  Had it up and running in no time.  I probably will buy another one once I've had this one for a while to see if it continues to operate properly.

Reviews.Title: Foscam FI9821W
Reviews.Author: Nigel
Reviews.Content: I recently bought an Foscam FI9821W for installing at our holiday home.  The set up is not for the faint hearted (unless you're a real geek and know all about this stuff), however their technical help line was excellent and got it all up and running for me wirelessly in one (long) call.  Make sure you have your router password to hand, they'll probably need it.  The tech guy I got was called John - if you get him, he's excellent!

Reviews.Title: IT WORKS, IT WORKS......
Reviews.Author: Bernard Pistello "GOLFCEO"
Reviews.Content: Great capabilities! Had to use tech help...Took over my computer and made everything work.  The plug and play is the best...

Reviews.Title: The Product has lived up to my expectation.
Reviews.Author: Ray W.
Reviews.Content: The Product has lived up to my expectation, but tech support is hit or miss. On 03/31/2014 I called for to get the cameras going. This took about an hour, but they are working. I asked if he could help sending alerts to my Iphone an Ipad like the other camera in home are doing and Mason my technician hung up the phone on me. Now if no one at this company can't help me with this issue there are other company that will.

Reviews.Title: Good, but not great, and likely not worth what it's going for right now.
Reviews.Author: Pravin
Reviews.Content: I tried using the camera --- it was ok.  I bought it mainly to have a third camera for a separate room.  I have two older versions (non-HD) of the Foscam that seem to work faster and better than this version.  I tried to hook all three up via wireless.  This camera version also doesn't work with the Foscam Pro App on the iPhone with sound -- only video.  It took much longer to load on my iPhone, iPad and computer.  Also, directionally, it did not have a 8 way control, only a 4 way.  The SD card slot simply didn't work, the interface kept telling me that there was no SD card installed.  Even on my home network, there was a significant delay between what was happening in real time and what was happening on the camera screen.  It was much slower on the same network I was running the other two cameras on.The camera may have been defective or something, but I just decided to return it in the end, guess I'll try and get one of the non-HD versions again.

Reviews.Title: Ralph Mendez gives great foscam support
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Ralph Mendez was able to provide me with fast and efficient support for my foscam.  He knew just exactly what should be done to correct a problem that has been bothering me for 3 month.  If I ever need tech support, he is the only tech that I will ask for.

Reviews.Title: AWESOME CAMERA
Reviews.Author: Mervin John "Mervin John"
Reviews.Content: This camera is awesome. Great quality. Calvin Harris from tech support helped me set this up to be able to view at home and on my mobile device. Excellent customer service.

Reviews.Title: calvin
Reviews.Author: Tom
Reviews.Content: Very good service.  Camera seems very nice.  Appreciate all the help. SD  card is a great feature on this camera ,  OK thank you

Reviews.Title: Excellent IT support
Reviews.Author: Michelle R. Daley
Reviews.Content: Called the IT line when having a few issues setting up on a Mac.  They had the issue fixed in two minutes.  The visual on the camera is great.

Reviews.Title: Foscam Cameras...F19821W and F19805W
Reviews.Author: Marauder
Reviews.Content: I purchased a Foscam camera in 2012. I was so impressed with the camera and Calvin in customer support that set my camera up  that I purchased two more when I needed them. The picture and video quality are superlative.  I can look in on my homestead from anywhere in the world. And yes, I had Calvin set these two up also since he did such a good job last time.I look forward to exploring all of the functions of these two new cameras...And for those naysayers out there, I did not get money, girls, or anything free for this review. Foscam has a GREAT product and customer support...they are proud of it and I thought you should know!!

Reviews.Title: got camera working quickly with no problems
Reviews.Author: David E Bradford
Reviews.Content: service was very helpful system working great would recomend foscam tomas was a good help I am pleased with this camera

Reviews.Title: Thank you foscam customer support!!!
Reviews.Author: Teddy Banica
Reviews.Content: Thank you to foscam for helping with the port fowarding of my cams. It was quick and easy for the tech support to get this done. I very much appreciate the assistance provided. I like the cams I purchased. They work very well and are suitable for my needs.

Reviews.Title: Great Service rom Foscam
Reviews.Author: mirion
Reviews.Content: Connection issues were resolved via remote connection in a prompt fashion Camera works great aS well. Will buy some more.

Reviews.Title: Foscam Thechnical Support
Reviews.Author: Gian Luca Popolani
Reviews.Content: The Thechnical support was great!! they solve all my connection problems with FOSCAM camera i purchase.Thanks a lot to Foscam!

Reviews.Title: Michelle is awesome
Reviews.Author: VaHistory
Reviews.Content: Thank you for the great service!  She made the set up look very easy and got the camera working on both browsers.

Reviews.Title: Great technical support
Reviews.Author: Joon Ko
Reviews.Content: I had problems setting up the wireless connection so I called tech support (Irish) and he solved my issues by remotely accessing my computer via teamviewer.  Irish was able to get my wireless connection set up immediately and also set up remote access and provided instructions to access the camera by phone. He typed the important details to a notepad (internet log in access and smart phone app settings) and saved the file to my desktop for future reference. Wait time seemed daunting (informed i was 11th in line and over 15min wait but it ended up being a 5min wait.  The operator informs of your place in line.  Great service! I will update the review later re: camera functionality.

Reviews.Title: Great Support
Reviews.Author: Sopheap Chea
Reviews.Content: Easily helped me set up my Foscam! Camera was easy to use. Would definitely recommended others to get this camera.

Reviews.Title: foscam camera
Reviews.Author: AL HEEGLE
Reviews.Content: difficult for the normal person to set up however the tech support is fantastic and sets the camera up via the phone and computer.

Reviews.Title: Great HD camera
Reviews.Author: JLPDX
Reviews.Content: I have two of these cameras and love them. I will probably get a few more. The images are crisp and clear in the day and the nighttime mode works well enough in lower light conditions for my needs.I connect these using "N" wireless which allows me to stream the camera feeds at the highest settings. When I had these setup on lower speed wireless (a/b/g) the streams were a little choppy. You can always lower the stream quality to compensate if N wireless isn't an option.I have no issues with the built in web app to manage the camera but I do not use it. I use a program called Blue Iris which serves as my DVR application too.My only complaint with these cameras are the LEDs. You cannot turn them off if you want the camera to automatically switch from day to night mode. I mounted my camera inside the house looking out a window in both cases. Those LEDs reflect off windows horribly and at night basically render the camera useless unless you find a way to deal with the LEDs.I found a work around on the internet where you basically create a little cover for the LEDs out of aluminum foil and then tape it down with black electrical tape.  It works great and solved the LED problem.I also think the newest Firmware at the timing of this review adds better control over the LEDs but I am not going to rip off the custom cover at this point to find out.

Reviews.Title: great camera, customer support
Reviews.Author: AV
Reviews.Content: Camera has a great picture.  I had some problems with the video showing on blue iris but tech support (eric hill) at foscam quickly got me back on track.  Of course, it was operator error on my part.  I have only used the camera a few days so I still haven't figured out all the features but so far I like the product.  I like the blue iris much better than the standard foscam program.  Customer support was great.  Thanks Eric.

Reviews.Title: Welcomed Upgrade from the FI9820
Reviews.Author: Brian "triggerx"
Reviews.Content: I've used several FI9820's over the years, and decided to make the leap to this HD model.  It works just the same as the older models, but comes with an improved web interface.  The interface still doesn't really play nice with Chrome, but it's no big deal to open it in Internet Explorer.  It has a memory card so you can actually record events based on movement... which I really like... no need to run separate software on a continuously running server anymore.  Anyway, I can't complain... it pans, tilts, and has a great range of motion.  It takes a little more time to "load" the picture than the FI9820's did, but that's to be expected due to the fact it carries an HD video stream.  I recommend this camera to anyone looking for a solid IP camera but not wanting to spend a ton.

Reviews.Title: cant beat it for the price!
Reviews.Author: Joe Labit
Reviews.Content: Love this camera! I us it at my business for security.  Irish at tech support was very helpful to get the camera viewable on my Iphone. I l Love how I can view it anywhere as well as move the camera in any direction with the tough of a button .

Reviews.Title: So far so good
Reviews.Author: THOMAS A BRUENN
Reviews.Content: Irish gave great customer service and the camera seems real good so far. I have the 26 as well, the 3x zoom is nice but im not sure if its worth the extra $

Reviews.Title: FOSCAM  Terrific
Reviews.Author: Beth53
Reviews.Content: Product great, support even better.  Setup looks daunting, but the great tech support team will login to your system and guide you through it.Thanks Foscam

Reviews.Title: Technical Support was EXCELLENT
Reviews.Author: M. Ishikawa "BMW"
Reviews.Content: I love this. Very easy to use AND the Technical support ( Felix ) was EXCELLENT!!  Get one and buy one.

Reviews.Title: its ok after all
Reviews.Author: jimmy p
Reviews.Content: ok I wrote a previous review and thought this thing was junk and a pain to get working but come to find it was just my old router was to out of date. Well I got new router and decided to give this camera another try and it works tested inside and works now I just have build a plexiglass box to put in so I can put it outside

Reviews.Title: Installation
Reviews.Author: karina
Reviews.Content: Andrew is an excellent customer service representative.I was thinking to return the camara, but I didn't because he did everything for me.I use it for my baby, and I love it.I can see her everywhere. (work, school, shopping )I really recommended for working moms.

Reviews.Title: Foscam cameras with Blue Iris Software
Reviews.Author: Wolly yarrow "Wolly Yarrow"
Reviews.Content: I have installed Blue Iris on a PC, managing a 4 camera Foscam system(a 9821V2, and three 8904 cameras).  Many Blue Iris software supplied system managementfunctions are being used, along with the configurability and control of thecameras, with great success.  The system has been up and running for a month now, withsolid reliability. The 9821 is wireless, and the three  8904 camerasare connected through ethernet cable to a Lynksys E2500 router.  Blue Iris software updates, along with Foscam firmwareavailability is great.  Thanks for the great Products!

Reviews.Title: Baby camera as a gift.
Reviews.Author: Seth B Harper
Reviews.Content: I recently received a pair of these cameras as a gift and was happy to see that they were wireless and gave me remote access anywhere with an internet connection.  After trying to set it up on my own I realized that it was not worth the time to learn how to do it properly so I called the Foscam support number 800-930-0949.  It was a Saturday and the response was very fast.  The tech agent Thomas worked quickly to set me up and got me going in no time.  It was a big help.

Reviews.Title: Setup
Reviews.Author: Dave
Reviews.Content: Difficult to connect to an Iphone but Calvin at tech support was very helpful and within 10 minutes it was live

Reviews.Title: Got this a while back but installed just a few weeks ago
Reviews.Author: Mugambo "LawnMowe"
Reviews.Content: With the help of customer service, which is excellent and waled me through the complete setup on a Saturday, had it installed and been monitoring my babies all the time while not home through my smart phone, got an app for 5$. its just great and i know exactly what happens when I am not home to the kids. We have a nanny at home and this really helped us in seeing what is happenning.Thanks Foscam and the customer service!I have one F19821W, will add another one or two to get cover the entire area.

Reviews.Title: Good camera
Reviews.Author: Courtney Essett
Reviews.Content: I use this for a nanny cam and it works just fine for my needs. Good picture and tech support (Calvin) was very fast, and efficient in helping me set it up wirelessly.

Reviews.Title: F19821v2 cam and support
Reviews.Author: illana rosenfeld
Reviews.Content: Great camera and great phone support answered phone right away and very knowledgeable staff!!!I just like the remote access ability of the camera and i can see all the cameras from a single camera...

Reviews.Title: Great Camera Technical Support
Reviews.Author: A R
Reviews.Content: This camera looks great so far. Crystal clear. Only had few days though so will update. Also the two gentleman that helped me over the phone both times were terrific . The first guy I mentioned too but this lasst guy also named Chris Johnson had other specialties which were needed to set up the camera.

Reviews.Title: Best Customer Support EVER!!!!
Reviews.Author: Jasoninflorida
Reviews.Content: Called Customer Support this morning and John was one of the most patient knowledgeable person I have ever worked with! John helped me upgrade the firmware so the camera would operate correctly to its fullest ability. It’s great to see that Foscam has employed such an excellent support staff for us. Just as a suggestion for people calling in… Cameras like these are newest technology sometimes having little issues.  To get them operating to our particular likings and to use all of their features possible- we must be able to have the extra time a technician will need to correctly to help us. Thanks John- you’re the BEST!

Reviews.Title: Easy setup, Decent Web UI
Reviews.Author: L. Jordan Bickel "Technomonk"
Reviews.Content: Pro:  Within an hour I was watching live video feed on my android phone using a unique URL.Con:  Motion Detection scheduling needs an upgrade, this is an important aspect of this product and this feature needs more attention.  It does the minimum, a single schedule, but if there was at least a simple way to turn off the schedule, i.e. always on, the minimum would be much easier to manage...Net positive, does what I need it to do and wasn't a hassle to get setup:  4 stars.Note to Foscam:  If the web UI was open source I would got add these features for you right now!

Reviews.Title: Product support
Reviews.Author: Paul
Reviews.Content: Calvin from product support very helpful when the plug- in did not upgrade on the most current firmware installation. Not really a Foscam issue but IE security so used Firefox to upgrade the plug-in.Just took a minute with TeamviewerGreat camera and very clear picture

Reviews.Title: Good camera
Reviews.Author: Jamie-Work
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera in spite of some bad reviews of it and similar models from Foscam.  You get what you pay for and I think it's a good deal.  It's a little tricky to get it set up to view on the web, but so is everything.  It has a noticeable click from time to time when it changes from day to night (IR).  If you turn off the IR in the software the click stops.  It is not security camera quality but it is great for keeping an eye on the pets when we're away.  I've never used the audio, so I can't comment on that.

Reviews.Title: Good camera NO good software
Reviews.Author: lasho71b
Reviews.Content: The camera work well. The software for this camera is bad. Foscam have to update the software for the new version of Windows like Win 7 64 or 32 bit. Other problem I have  - this camera can't send any message with snapshot(picture) if alarm it is setup.

Reviews.Title: Works with the right app.
Reviews.Author: Pablowablo
Reviews.Content: Was finally able to get it to work with the right app, LiveCams Pro. Don't bother calling customer service.They didn't know squat on how to make it work and could barely speak english. It has a wider field of view than my Loftek CXS 2200 and much better sound.

Reviews.Title: Works Ok but what a pain to hook up
Reviews.Author: John Vandersloot
Reviews.Content: Glad I have a best friend who owners a IT company. He had to come over to get this thing hooked up. I am certain an average person will struggle with the install.(software)Camera works pretty good just viewing the inside of my house. I would have thought resolution would be better.I actually bought it to monitor my aquarium but it is useless for this. Not sure if the arcinic lights or what but really can see no details in the tank at all.I am actually returning the camera for this reason.

Reviews.Title: Horrible Customer Service, Defective Camera
Reviews.Author: Howard "Howie"
Reviews.Content: I wrote this review for the Black Model too, but since they are separate products for reviews I will post it for the White one also so buyers beware.Purchased the Foscam FI9821W V2 from a Groupon deal. After setting it up I noticed depending on how the light in the room was the image was flickering with a bluish hue. I googled the issue and came across this thread ([...] lots of people experiencing the same issue. I contacted Foscam and they said it could be one of 3 issues. 1. I needed to update my firmware (I had already done this) 2. IR filter was out of wack (they wanted me to shine a flashlight at the camera for a minute, this didnt work). 3. Issue during manufacturing where the sensor was screwed on to tight. (needed to send it in for repairs). They also wanted me to pay to send it in for repairs, when I never had a fully working device to begin with. There customer service is horrible and takes almost 2 days to respond to emails. They don't respond to post on their message board. As it stands now I'd stay far away from this camera and maybe Foscam in general.***Update 12/10/13*** Returned my first one to Foscam, replacement came and had the exact same issue, called Foscam they asked me to send it back again. Pass! I contacted Groupon and asked for a refund.  They quickly agreed and it sounded like they have got a lot of requests. Bad product and even worse customer service.

Reviews.Title: Never again!
Reviews.Author: N. J. Schreiber "Dreadneck13"
Reviews.Content: Set up is a pain and It isn't explained very well - the port forwarding doesn't work like you would expect. I am tech savvy and I had to call their tech support. They had to remote in to my computer and it took them almost 2 hours to get all working, and this is on a standard modem and router.Set up is only half the problem, the camera software is horrendous. Panning or tilting from the website was unresponsive and buggy. The voice over internet was inaudible and just sounded like feedback. The auto IR was annoying, it would click on and off all night while watching TV because it would detect the bright flashes of the TV and turn the IR off and then during the dark scenes it would turn the IR on.I bought the Foscam to test, if I liked it I was going to buy more. I missed the return period so I I ended up tossing the Foscam in a drawer and buying three new cameras from a different maker.Camera quality was OK. Nothing great and far less than other cameras I have seen.My friend is going out of town and wanted to borrow my Foscam, since I am no longer using it I told him he could take it. I also warned him that set up is a pain. He owns an IT service so he was like - I think I can handle it. Well, he called me and couldn't believe how stupid it was to set it up, HE had to call tech support and again it took them over an hour and half to get it working correctly with port forwarding  and email.There are so many great home cameras on the market and unfortunately the Foscam seems to be way behind the pack in terms of quality, function, setup and software. I would never buy any of their products again.

Reviews.Title: FOSCAM shipped half way repaired junk as "new"! Also, horrible Phone Support
Reviews.Author: 4mark2009
Reviews.Content: I purchased direct from FOSCAM.US the FI9826W and FI9806W in May 2014. The 9826 was obviously re-boxed, missing plastic wrap and smelled like it had been “on fire”, burnt microchip smell. The cam preset and other functions did not work.Calling FOSCAM for support was a nightmare. I tried 8 times, and spent 4 hrs 19 minutes on hold. Then, I never did get the needed assistance. The Foscam phone support tech hardly understood English as if I could understand anything he was saying on that broken voice over IP phone system they use.After all that, the phone technician finally told me I needed an RMA. But, I must send an email requesting replacement to: replacement@foscam.us. So, I sent them an email a few days ago. THEY HAVE NOT YET REPLIED. Looks like I will need to contact my Credit Card Company to get a refund. HORRIBLE!PRE-SALE QUESTIONS? GIVE UP! I called to ask if the FI8906W requires a 12v or 5v cable. I was on hold 97 minutes total. I was hung-up on my first call by a phone technician. SECOND CALL: The phone technician was guessing at an answer of 5volts. But, how can that be true when all the other outdoor cams are 12v to power 30-60 LEDs? Foscam support was guessing based on wrongly listed accessories on the 8906 web page. No answer was ever confirmed by Fascom. I got the correct “12 volt” answer from a YouTube video. I needed to be sure before purchasing 3x cables at 14.99 each. Foscam was wrong. HORRIBLE!AUDIO QUESTION? Do you want to know if the cam audio-in is line level or electorate microphone? GIVE UP, Foscam support can not answer. They will guess and cost you a lot of effort, time and, money.Who are these people that give this company good review? Could it be Foscam Public Relation posting lies? YES, all the reviews saying great support MUST BE a Foscam Public Relation Company posting propaganda!I will send my cams back and fight the charges with my credit card. Stick a fork in me, I’m done.

Reviews.Title: THOMAS IS THE BEST
Reviews.Author: Karin M Niemeyer
Reviews.Content: THIS IS THE BEST CUSTOMER SERVICE I HAVE EVER EXPERIENCE.  GREAT PRODUCT WITH GREAT SUPPORT.  THOMAS IN SUPPORT IS AMAZING.  I WOULD RECOMMEND THIS CAMERA AND COMPANY FOR ANYONE NEEDING EXTRA EYES AT HOME.

Reviews.Title: Poor
Reviews.Author: Craig Bates
Reviews.Content: Slow web response to the point of unusable even when hooked directly to the router. Would not buy again. JUNK

Reviews.Title: DO NOT BUY THIS MODEL 9821W
Reviews.Author: Ben Liri
Reviews.Content: DO NOT BUY THIS MODEL 9821W they are nothing but a piece of junk. I bought 5 model 8918 and they never give me any problem at all. 9821w, if u have slow Internet connection, it will never, never work and I have fios 50/25 Mbps speed and still having problem connecting. I have to reboot this piece of junk all the time. Save your money. DO NOT BUY THIS JUNK.

Reviews.Title: thomas
Reviews.Author: larrie cherrey
Reviews.Content: I was very happy with service and my cam is working now with his help. I am happy with everything that foscam has done so farThanks again Thomas

Reviews.Title: Camera returned controls and video lagged
Reviews.Author: Vickie Osborne
Reviews.Content: This camera was difficult to setup. It required 2 phone calls to tech support and 1 phone call to my ISP. I returned the camera because the the response to to the controls and video lagged so much that the tilt and pan were useless to me. If I moved the camera I never knew where it would end up. The recorded images and video were good quality if you did not need the remote access.

Reviews.Title: Great camera, but software setup took a while.
Reviews.Author: James R
Reviews.Content: This is a great camera with a lot of features at a reasonable price, just wish the software setup is a little easier.  It took some time to get the plug-in and email alert to work.  I still not able to get the wireless to work (even it is next to my router), but have no problem once the camera is connected with the CAT5 wire.

Reviews.Title: Like the camera, love the support
Reviews.Author: Dave Schoen
Reviews.Content: Actually bought the camera through Foscam directly, but thought I'd add a comment about their support. Guy by the name of Marshall provided the support. Couldn't get my computer to see the camera. I let him take remote control of my machine and with a couple of minutes I was up and running. Unfortunately I have to go right to the camera instead of running their camera app. Marshall says there are some know issues to be fixed in the near future. At least I can use it the way it is and using a Windows Phone app (CameraKaze?) I can use the camera as well including panning and tilting.

Reviews.Title: Fickle, Buggy, Poor Instructions
Reviews.Author: erie_v_tompkins
Reviews.Content: First, consider the source:  I have no engineering degree or certifications.  But I do have a graduate degree and am a member of Mensa.  So I'm not a self-professed "technie," but I'm not a moron, either.Now:  This *might* be a good product if you have considerable experience with networking, port forwarding, troubleshooting etc.  BUT it is NOT a good product if you're just trying to stretch the boundaries of your experience.  This is the first review I've written on Amazon (or anywhere, for that matter) because this product has been so frustratingly difficult that it merits warning others.It took me around 10 hours before making two of these cameras operational.  And to get to that point, I had to stumble my way through upgrading the firmware.  Why, when purchasing the product, it is not already loaded with months-old firmware is a mystery.  When finally making the cameras operational, that lasted about a week.  Keep in mind the instructions are minimally useful.  That was a huge part of the problem.  I had to Google over and over to try to stumble my way through troubleshooting, most often relying on Foscam forums' bits and pieces of info.  No single source for the multiple hurdles ever contained all of the help needed to get these cameras up and working.Then, both cameras started giving us trouble.  By now I've spent close to 20 hours messing with these things.  One camera may be okay.  But the video on the other died when we used the panning controls on the Android app tinyCam Monitor PRO.  Don't think that it might be the app, because after 2 1/2 hours of slogging through a factory reboot and getting the camera operational, as soon as I tried the pan feature in Foscam's own camera management software, the video went dead.  In fact, the audio is dead.  The microphone function from laptop to the camera's speaker will work, but the audio and video streaming from the camera to computer (obviously, the more important functions) does not work.This is a horrifyingly troublesome product, and I just wanted to believe I could get it to work.  Our Summer brand baby monitors have been dying regularly--one expensive video monitor per year for 3 years now--that there had to be a better answer out there.  Unfortunately, this product was *not* the answer at all.Ugh.

Reviews.Title: So far so good...and amazing customer service
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "Seeh2o"
Reviews.Content: The quick installation guide was hard to follow, so I went to their website, watched the videos.  I got it working - partially.  I gave up and called their support dept. Amazing, Marshall (at ext 5053) remoted into my computer and completed the process in about 10 minutes.  It took me hours to get to the point where I called.  Don't waste your time putzing around on your own...call them and they'll get it all set up and answer your questions!  I can't wait to start using this to snoop on my dogs!

Reviews.Title: 720p is awesome!  so clear!
Reviews.Author: Tung Mau Vu "dark star"
Reviews.Content: i had the older version of Foscam with the low resolution of 640x320. that was pathetic so i was hesitant to get this HD version... now that i have this 720p HD from Foscam,  i love it!!!  the video is super clear. you can see so much more detail! the still snapshot is good but the video is amazing! setting up is easy. just follow the manual people!  the hardest part is port forwarding so you can view your house remotely, from another location.  port forwarding's level of difficulty is based on your router, not Foscam.

Reviews.Title: Not usable over wifi
Reviews.Author: Jayhova
Reviews.Content: Everything appeared to work via wired connection but then using wifi functionality was barely there.  Time sync, alert emails just stopped working.  Viewing the camera and panning around via camera web page had severe lag.  Sometimes camera would not respond at all to commands for 5+ seconds.  Tried several wifi channels, hard reset camera, etc, no help.  All this was experienced while the camera was sitting right next to the wireless router.  No other wifi devices in household have issues.  Viewing and controlling was tested within the same home network.Also tried using with Qnap NAS surveillance station software for recording and other features.  Software reported frequent connection interruptions to the camera and had the same very slow or no communication over wireless.Very tech savvy user.  Purchased outside of Amazon but wanted to share my experience for others here.  Will be returning for a refund until foscam can work out hardware and software build and reliability issues for this HD model.  Has a great feature set for the price point.  If only all the features worked.  Might be ok if all you want to do is look at the picture.  Cannot recommend for reliable home monitoring use (my use case)until they improve things.

Reviews.Title: Good camera for general purpose
Reviews.Author: huy k nguyen
Reviews.Content: Easy to setup once you know  how port forward on  the network.  Very good quality image for nanny cams or home surveillances.

Reviews.Title: very good cam!
Reviews.Author: Luiz Felippe Barbeiro
Reviews.Content: Excellent camera!Clearly hd images.I'm bought 3 of them...very very satisfied.Recommend to a friend...Luiz Barbeiro from Brazil.

Reviews.Title: OMG The best customer service on the planet!
Reviews.Author: Troy Emmett
Reviews.Content: Calvin the rep was un believable! Best customer service I have ever experienced! The cameras are the best I have ever used as well!

Reviews.Title: Foscam camera 8910
Reviews.Author: Ellen
Reviews.Content: this is my second foscam camera and i'm NOT tech savvy but tech is wonderful especially Thomas, so buy with peace of mind

Reviews.Title: Foscam Support
Reviews.Author: Charles W Hansen III
Reviews.Content: Calvin from support was incredibly helpful in helping me set up the camera so I can use it on my IPad, IPhone, Mac and PC. I am very happy with the service and product.

Reviews.Title: Foscam model f18916w
Reviews.Author: James Wilkie
Reviews.Content: I have called the techs several times to help with the setup and controlling of the camera and every one that I have talked to have been very helpful. Today I called to find out how to control camera from my cell phone and Calvin within in short time showed me what to do.I will tell my friends who are looking to purchase a security camera for their house to buy the Foscam because the ease of setup and operation for their cell phone.

Reviews.Title: Great Great Great
Reviews.Author: David Rompalo
Reviews.Content: Max Bright helped me setup my camera and port forwarding.  He even took the time to help me setup my mobile app.  I was extremely pleased with the support I received from Foscam.David R

Reviews.Title: Excellent service,  wonderful cameras
Reviews.Author: skittergitchy
Reviews.Content: Thomas is the best in service, got my cameras up and working in no time!  Foscam cameras are the best, with the clearest images and great night vision

Reviews.Title: Outstanding
Reviews.Author: William H. Morton
Reviews.Content: Calvin provided outstanding service and help me get both of my new cameras going.  I like the ability to be able to pan, have the alarms go off as well as getting e-mails.  Outstanding quality and equipment.

Reviews.Title: Great camera system
Reviews.Author: francois mercier
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for remote viewing, i did use the remote technicien ,Ralph, and did a great job to set up the cameras.

Reviews.Title: great service!!!
Reviews.Author: omar saleh
Reviews.Content: very helpful thomas was great and helped me with all the help i needed. great work performed at a good time!

Reviews.Title: Calvin was great.
Reviews.Author: L. Condiff
Reviews.Content: The support at Foscam is fantastic....Calvin was great and a lot of help.  He got my unit up and running.  Thanks.

Reviews.Title: This is an amazing camera.
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I just installed this camera on my laptop and on my Iphone 5. It took about 15 minutes with the help of Calvin from the tech support line. It works great, i can access it from anywhere in the world . it even has night vision. I would highly recomend this camera to anyone wanting to avail of this amazing and easy to use camera

Reviews.Title: Foscam Support
Reviews.Author: harvey s rose
Reviews.Content: Calvin did a wonderful job installing my software and I have used this product for many years and support is always great if I need it

Reviews.Title: Foscam Support
Reviews.Author: Mr. L. Wilson
Reviews.Content: Spoke to Calvin very helpful and solved my wireless connection problem in no time. I appreciated his help and will call again if I need further assistance.

Reviews.Title: technical support
Reviews.Author: Gary W King
Reviews.Content: Technician thomas was knowledgable, quick and to the point resolving my issue.  Thank You for all your assistance.  gary king

Reviews.Title: technical support
Reviews.Author: Chrissy Johnson
Reviews.Content: Thomas with technical support was excellent.  We were unable to get these cameras up and running on our own so I called technical support and Thomas had us connected quickly and easily.  Very happy with the service!!

Reviews.Title: THE BEST
Reviews.Author: ALFAOMGEA74
Reviews.Content: Thomas WAS GREAT HE WAS FAST AT HAND AND HELP ME SET IT UP ! IM VERY HAPPY WITH THE PRODUCT I WILL BUY 2 MORE AND TELL MY FRIENDS AND FAMILY SUPPORT PULS A GREAT HELP MAKES ALL THE DIFFRENTS! THANKS FOSCAM!

Reviews.Title: So far so good except, it wont play some videos.
Reviews.Author: Johnny k.
Reviews.Content: Image quality is usable during the day time. I haven't really tried night time with IR as it is shooting through a window. The only issue I have is the video playback. Once a while a random video will not play. It could be a video that was record 10 seconds ago or 10 days ago.

Reviews.Title: camera and service
Reviews.Author: Nana
Reviews.Content: Calvin did a great job.  I love the camera.I use this camera for my home use.  It is very affordable and easy to use.

Reviews.Title: Foscam camera and support
Reviews.Author: Sarah B.
Reviews.Content: Support was excellent when setting up camera for remote access.  Called Foscam customer support to set up device and representative was quick and efficient.  Very happy with purchase!

Reviews.Title: Technical Support Summary
Reviews.Author: Malcolm F. Lederman
Reviews.Content: John did a great did an excellent job.Please put him in for a promotion and a raise.M. Lederman

Reviews.Title: Foscam f19821 v2 is worth it
Reviews.Author: Sudip Shah
Reviews.Content: So far this camera has been pretty good.  I've noticed some serious lag in video, but after setting the Iris to ON,  everything has been working great. Liking the camera alot.  The Tech from Foscam, Irish, was a great help and no way i could have done this without his help

Reviews.Title: Not easy to set up, but with excellent phone support, they'll do it, and it's fantastic.
Reviews.Author: John W. B. "John"
Reviews.Content: I tried to get a camera that would work with micasa which monitors temperature and open doors.  I ended up with this camera and use it's own software.  It is very difficult to set up, with various wireless and internet connections.  But phone support on this product is excellent.  They take over your screen (watch carefully to learn what they're doing) and they'll get it all up and running for you.

Reviews.Title: Foscam Camera
Reviews.Author: Johnny K Lee
Reviews.Content: Love this Camera but need some help setting up. I reached Tech support and talked with Kate and she helped me with ease!!!! Thanks Foscam

Reviews.Title: Good customer service
Reviews.Author: David
Reviews.Content: Overall I have had really great help through Customer support in setting up/assisting in connecting the camera.  This last call didn't have the best experience with a person that did not talk to me on the phone, i couldn't understand him with the horrible accent, and i got hung up on (sort disconnected accidentally doesn't happen!).  So i called back and got in touch with a guy named Fred Jacobs.  He did an excellent job remotely accessing my computer and resetting up my camera after it stopped working after a recent power outage.  Anyhow, I would recommend this camera and using their customer service.  They are knowledgeable about the product and the software connected.  Just hope you get a quality person like Fred.  Thank you.

Reviews.Title: Excellent help from Kate
Reviews.Author: Ricardo Reyes
Reviews.Content: I am very pleased with Kate at customer support for setting up my camera and will be adding more cameras in my home

Reviews.Title: Does just what I need
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "oklahomabluesman"
Reviews.Content: This is my first IP camera and I had no idea how to set it up or use it. After reading reviews and seeing that this model had a slot for an SD card I decided to give it a try.Setting it up was above my pay grade and I had to call Foscam support.They took over and got me going and it's working great.I had to get help to get the motion detection and email alerts and ended up talking to Alan Smith. He very quickly got it all taken care of and even gave me a doc to set up my computer at work to be able to monitor my cam there.The camera has worked perfectly but more than anything I am impressed with the Foscam phone support.Alan immediately know what I was needing and got it done.Top notch!

Reviews.Title: foscam product
Reviews.Author: Algernon M. Carter
Reviews.Content: So far the camera has been doing what I expected of it. I have not really gotten into the meat of the system but it seem to work very well. The technical support service was excellent I would give them 5 stars. The technician was very patient, understanding, very knowledgeable about the product and walk me through the setup step by step. I will recommend this product to anyone interesting in getting one. Excellent product it even works on my android phone.

Reviews.Title: Foscam FI9821W Technical Support
Reviews.Author: D. Patterson
Reviews.Content: Needed help with setting up the camera remotely. Ralph MendezHe was able to assure me that I had set up the system and showed me why I could not see it....Great help fast.

Reviews.Title: works as advertised
Reviews.Author: Darrin Branch
Reviews.Content: clear wireless connection. nice video. easy to mount. software and customer service friendly. .clear picture clarity. works well with set up of multiple cameras

Reviews.Title: You get what you pay for...
Reviews.Author: Jamie
Reviews.Content: I took a chance on buying this, it's a cheap camera.  The audio isn't useable, there is a loud clicking noise coming from the speaker.  The camera functions, however, work ok.  The Windows software and Android app also work well enough.  Don't expect anything amazing from this camera, but it does have decent video.  I bought it to keep an eye on the pets while on vacation and it works well for that.

Reviews.Title: Great Customer Service
Reviews.Author: LaughingMan
Reviews.Content: Easy Set up - my 8th Foscam camera.  Great HD picture!  They remotely  installed it for me.  I love the remote access on the iphone!

ProductInfo.Features:
The FI9821W V2 comes equipped with a faster chipset than its predecessor, offering better performance. HD quality, 1280 x 720 Resolution
Features like Two-Way Audio and Multiple Camera Setup Are Now Accessible On Chrome, Firefox, and Safari
H.264 Video Compression & Free Manufacturer's DDNS Included
Completely Redesigned WebUI, Wider Viewing Angle of 70°
Accessible With iPhone Apps like Live Cams Pro, and Android Apps such as TinyCam Monitor
ProductInfo.Name: Foscam FI9821W  V2 Megapixel HD 1280 x 720p H.264 Wireless/Wired Pan/Tilt IP Camera with IR-Cut Filter (White)
